Description: Ring foot and wall sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery open vessel (bowl?); inner face of foot bevelled; glazed black on interior, exterior and inner face of foot; reserved stand-ring and underside with ring in black; inscription incised on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 487)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.2011)
